content.body: I did a bit of testing myself and the answer seems to be yes. One shouldn't make sure that they mess with or lose the data outside of their subjection of their buffer.
Domenic: is it intentional that `error` dispatches more often than `load` here: https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#execute-the-script-element
content.formatted_body: Domenic: is it intentional that error dispatches more often than load here: https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#execute-the-script-element
